item.description:
Hey Everyone-

Sorry to be putting this out so late. I was planning on doing this Saturday morning and ended up in NYC all weekend.

Anyway, I would love to do a game night this week and I thought Wednesday would be a good night. At the moment I only have Scattergories, What If, and Cards, but would be willing to bring any and/or all of those.

Please feel free to bring any games you wish. I hear this venue is pretty well-lit and not at all crowded in the evenings. it is in Davis Sq which I know a lot of people are considering to be a good place for meet-ups.

Looking forward to seeing whoever is coming;

Becki
item.name: Game Meet-Up @ Mr. Crepe
